body:
Add tribool.patch to add explicit casts from tribool to bool in two
places.  Boost, starting with version 1.69, turned on explicit
conversions for tribool, which breaks the build for dyninst.

----------

The purpose of this PR is to allow dyninst 9.3.x and 10.0.0 to work
with the latest boost >= 1.69.

Also, probably within a week, I expect dyninst 10.1.0 to be released.
10.1 will include the patch.

My plan is to wait for 10.1 to be tagged and released and fold that
into this PR.  It's a 1-line change to add version 10.1.0 and I could
add that line now.  (I know what the tag will be.)  We just have wait
until the tag exists before merging the PR.

I'm leaning in favor of waiting, but we could do two commits if the
release is delayed.  Either way.

ping @hainest from dyninst
title: dyninst: add patch to work with new boost
